dmca.title: Response to Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Dear Sir/Madam, 

We are writing you on behalf of a noticed we received about some images that were posted on our website www.siliconsolar.com in violation of copyright law. 

We were information by the manufacture of the solar light being sold that these images were to be used for promotional reasons. We apologize for the inconvenience and have immediately removed all
